page.title: 06MINERS
page.content: The most popular jobs in my survey were miners. This is mainly because of the area we live in with coal mines round about. Nearly all my mums side ot the familiynwhere miners but my uncle who is 29 years old and my grandad are deputies of collieries, but my uncle is at the Tech because he is going to be a manager. This means that people are becoming more in charge and higher jobs at younger ages. All the people I have surveyed believed in male and female equality in jobs, but my mum and aunty says that they still like to be taken out by their husband and wouldn't pay for a man. Nobody in my survey has had the same job all their life this is sometimes because they have been promoted or because the firm they worked for have closed down or moved their shops to other towns.
